perturbation.original_text:
Wade will allow Naked to use any quotes that are attributed to Wade to promote the Naked Products and Wade Products in any advertising
campaign. Wade will allow Naked to use any such attributed quotes that Naked  requires to promote the Naked Products and Wade Products,
subject to Wade’s right to approve such quotes in writing, which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld.
perturbation.changed_text:
Wade may permit Naked to use any quotes that are attributed to Wade to promote the Naked Products and Wade Products in any advertising
campaign. Wade may allow Naked to use any such attributed quotes that Naked desires to promote the Naked Products and Wade Products,
subject to Wade’s option to approve such quotes in writing, which approval shall be at Wade's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states 'Wade will allow' implying an obligation. The modified text states 'Wade may permit/allow' and 'Wade's option to approve', significantly weakening Wade's commitment to provide quotes. Further, changing 'shall not be unreasonably withheld' to 'at Wade's sole discretion' completely removes Naked's recourse if Wade chooses not to approve any quotes, creating a contradiction regarding Wade's cooperation in promotional activities.

perturbation.original_text:
Naked and Wade (either Athlete or a team and/or agent and/or designer designated by Athlete, referred to as the “Wade Team”) agree to
collaborate on the design and manufacture of a new line of Innerwear under the brand “Wade By Naked” or such other brand name as the Parties
agree (collectively, the “Wade Products”). Athlete will have the title of “Creative Director” for the Wade Products, which title shall be featured on
the Commercial Materials.
perturbation.changed_text: Naked will solely determine the design and manufacture of a new line of Innerwear under the brand “Wade By Naked” or such other brand name as Naked deems appropriate (collectively, the “Wade Products”). Naked will assign the title of "Product Consultant" to Athlete, which title may be featured on the Commercial Materials.
perturbation.explanation: The original text suggests a collaborative effort between Naked and the Wade Team regarding design and gives Athlete the title of "Creative Director". The modified text gives Naked sole discretion over the design and demotes Athlete to a mere "Product Consultant," whose title may or may not be featured in commercial materials. This contradicts the spirit of collaboration and the value of Athlete's creative input.

perturbation.original_text:
Athlete will provide Naked with access to Wade’s contacts and Wade’s expertise and breadth of experience as it pertains
to the business of Naked;
perturbation.changed_text: Athlete may optionally provide Naked with access to Wade’s contacts and Wade's potentially relevant experience as it pertains to Naked's business strategies;
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Athlete will provide access to contacts and expertise, creating an obligation. The modified text uses 'may optionally provide' removing the obligation and making it voluntary. The phrase 'potentially relevant experience' diminishes the value of Wade's contribution, causing an in-text contradiction that could create disputes over the expected level of Athlete's involvement.
